## RenderProps type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type RenderProps<TCanvas extends Element> = Omit<StoreProps, "gl" | "events" | "size"> & {
    gl?: GLProps;
    events?: (store: UseStore<RootState>) => EventManager<TCanvas>;
    size?: Size;
    onCreated?: (state: RootState) => void;
};
```
